messages.subject: Paging Colonel Hart
messages.msgSnippet: ハット　actually, So there may not be an R in there at all. I am researching a sword presented as a gift before during or just at the end of the war by
messages.messageBody:
ハット　actually,
So there may not be an R in there at all. I am researching a sword
presented as a gift before during or just at the end of the war by
Ogasawara Kazuo of the Imperial Taiwan University to Colonel Hart (at
least I think thats the name). There is no date and no other info. I
have found some interesting info about Professor Ogasawara but don't
know where to look for the Colonel. Does anyone know which units
might have helped dismantle the Japanese occupation of Taiwan
(American or British) and how I might identify officers in those groups?
Any help appreciated,
-t

Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
